core_mechanic.name: The Legacy Engine
core_mechanic.description: A narrative dice pool system based on Cortex Prime.
procedure: Assemble a dice pool from relevant Traits (Attributes, Skills, Signature Traits, etc.).
Roll all dice in the pool.
Choose TWO dice and add them together to create a TOTAL.
Compare the TOTAL to the Difficulty to determine success.
Choose ONE remaining die to be the EFFECT die, representing the magnitude of the action.

attributes.name: Influence

narrative_moves.name: Barrage

narrative_moves.description: Move, reposition, or alter the battlefield.

narrative_moves.description: Defend, heal, or empower an ally.

narrative_moves.name: Debilitate
narrative_moves.description: Hinder, trap, or weaken a foe without direct harm.

core_statuses.name: Asset
core_statuses.description: A temporary, helpful trait with a die rating.

core_statuses.name: Complication
core_statuses.description: A temporary, harmful trait with a die rating.

core_statuses.name: Stress
core_statuses.description: A special Complication representing physical, mental, or supernatural harm. If increased beyond d12, the character is Taken Out.
